text: 61|5|Arau smarana karaa, mucha'i yetiya te'omra sampradayaka kaichila, ‘he mora sampradaya! Tomaloke kiya moka kasta di acha? Athaca tomaloke jana ye, niscaya ma'i tomalokara prati (praeraita) allahara raachula’. Tara pichata sihamte yetiya bakra patha aralambana karaile tetiya allahe sihamtara hrdayasamuhaka bakra karai dile; arau allahe phachikba sampradayaka hidayata nakarae.
